column4: I'm fairly familiar.  You did an apt-get remove mysql-server obviously.  Did you go into /etc/ and get rid of all config files if there were any left?
btw, I'm about to embark on intrepid upgrade; I might lose you in the process....
should be fine; it's not like I'm doing a windows update.  ;)
It will be restarting, just don't know if it will ask me first.  Have you been here:  http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=446085  ?
